titles.title: Quit Smoking Incentive and Opportunity Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit for amounts paid for products and counseling designed to assist individuals to cease using tobacco products.
Quit Smoking Incentive and Opportunity Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Quit Smoking Incentive and Opportunity Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited credit for the qualified tobacco use cessation expenses (approved cessation products and counseling) of a taxpayer, the taxpayer's spouse, or any dependent of the taxpayer.
